about_the_game: This DLC will unlock Liam & Beth's Studio Apartment. Experience a love story as you assist this endearing couple in designing their first shared space. Your ingenuity will be put to the test with thrilling blast puzzles, each solution revealing another piece of their haven. Step into their shoes, make their dreams a reality, and witness as every puzzle solved brings them one step closer to their cozy, love-filled nest. Let your creativity fuel their love story!
detailed_description: This DLC will unlock Liam & Beth's Studio Apartment. Experience a love story as you assist this endearing couple in designing their first shared space. Your ingenuity will be put to the test with thrilling blast puzzles, each solution revealing another piece of their haven. Step into their shoes, make their dreams a reality, and witness as every puzzle solved brings them one step closer to their cozy, love-filled nest. Let your creativity fuel their love story!
